name: powershell-mcp-server
description: MCP server for PowerShell command execution

scripts.build:test: npm run build && npm run test:enterprise
scripts.build:enterprise: tsc src/server.ts --outDir dist --target ES2020 --module ESNext --moduleResolution Node --strict --declaration --sourceMap
scripts.build:legacy: tsc src/vscode-server.ts --outDir dist --target ES2020 --module ESNext --moduleResolution Node --declaration --sourceMap --noStrict
scripts.precommit: npm run compliance:check && npm run build
scripts.baseline:daily: npm run stats:codebase && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$env:STRESS_REQUESTS=100; $env:STRESS_CONCURRENCY=15; node tests/stress-test.mjs"
